name: Video Record

outputs.name: On Start
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the recording starts

outputs.name: Recording
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node during recording

outputs.name: On Stop
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the recording is stopped or paused

outputs.name: Not Recording
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when recording is not started

description: Execute the next node when recording. By default, in Effect House preview, it is always recording.
